3: No abnormalities in all areas. All Corrupted cleared.
The tactical terminal has been found, but there were no clues about the sound of singing. Could it be that Liv heard it wrong?
Liv?
The sound of singing... is coming from the tactical terminal.
I'll go check it now.
W-who's here?
That voice is...
We're the Gray Raven.
He-Hello!
Liv has actually made the first move?
He-Hello...
Commandant, does this way of talking sound familiar to you in terms of frequency?
Liv and Condelina... Perhaps that's why Liv is the only one that can hear the sound of Condelina's memory on the terminal.
Liv and Condelina... I can't say for sure. But perhaps that's why Liv is the only one that can hear the sound of Condelina's memory on the terminal.
Pardon me, I heard the sound of singing just now. I guess it's from you...
Ah, that's embarrassing! My voice must be awful... I'm sooo sorry!
Not at all! You have a beautiful voice! I even forgot about the battle since I was totally attracted to it...
According to the data, memory type: Condelina, one of the members of the Moe Army, also a first-class assassin. Records also show that she's introverted and shy with a passion for singing...
Well, the memory integrity test passed. No signs of Punishing Virus corruption were detected.
...The memory integrity test passed. No signs of Punishing Virus corruption were detected.
Commandant, I've explained the current situation to Condelina and she agreed to assist us. But...
Commandant, I'd like to ask Condelina to sing for us at the end of our recycle mission...
Condelina has such a sweet voice! Can I ask for your approval?
Awesome!
...How long do we have to stand here like this?
After all, Liv is the only one that can hear the sound of singing from Condelina, but at least...

2: She really seems to like it.
4: Let's wait a little longer, Lee...

3: ...Seems that there's no other choice. I see...
